dimensions: Warp x Weft: 341.6 x 66.7 cm (11 ft. 2 1/2 in. x 26 1/4 in.)
title: Horsehair Striae 001
medium:
Medium: cotton warp, horsehair weft
Technique: plain weave
description: Off-white horse hair is used end to end as the weft, with several inches left unwoven at each side. Panel has subtle variations in color created by slight differences in the shades of horse hair used.
